  • Method Details

    • getStudents

      List<Student> getStudents()
      Retrieves the list of all students.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects.

    • addStudent

      int addStudent(String userName, String name, String role, String password, String department)
      Adds a new student to the system.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the new student.
      name - The name of the new student.
      role - The role of the new student.
      password - The password for the new student.
      department - The department of the new student.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added student.

    • findStudentByUsername

      Student findStudentByUsername(String userName)
      Finds a student by their username.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the student.
      Returns:
      The Student object if found, otherwise null.

    • registerCourses

      void registerCourses(int studentId, List<String> primaryCourses, List<String> alternateCourses)
      Registers courses for a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      primaryCourses - A list of primary course IDs.
      alternateCourses - A list of alternate course IDs.

    • addCourse

      void addCourse(int studentId, String courseId)
      Adds a single course for a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      courseId - The ID of the course to add.

    • dropCourse

      void dropCourse(int studentId, String courseId)
      Drops a single course for a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      courseId - The ID of the course to drop.

    • checkPaymentWindow

      Boolean checkPaymentWindow(int studentID)
      Checks if the payment window is currently open.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The ID of the student.
      Returns:
      true if the payment window is open, false otherwise.

      studentId - The ID of the student.
      amountDue - The amount due that was paid.

    • saveCardDetails

      studentId - The ID of the student.
      cardNumber - The card number.
      cardExpiry - The card expiry date.
      cardCVV - The card CVV.
      Returns:
      true if the card details are saved successfully, false otherwise.
